segments.text: Excuse me , I am a transit passenger for flight PB965 , can you tell me where to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see ... Your plane leaves from gate 8 so you should go there to board the plane .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take the lift over there and turn left . You won't miss it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope it hasn't left without me .
segments.speaker: S1
